item.title: About Hugo Ivy
item.description: This Hugo theme was ported from Ivy, a minimalist website generator built in Python. I don't have time to document this theme. You have to read the source code to understand what it can do. All I can say for now is that I love it. It is clean, minimal, and responsive. I hope you will enjoy this theme. The source code is on Github. Happy hacking!

item.title: Covid-19 in Skagit Valley, Wa
item.description: Total daily counts of covid-19 cases, hospitalizations and deaths reported by Skagit Public Health. Cases include total confirmed and presumptive positives, which means that a private lab reported a positive test. Hospitalized are people with positive tests who were hospitalized at any point during their illness. The first case in Skagit Valley was reported on March 10, 2020.
